explains: n. 家具；供应；穿戴用品（furnishing 的复数）
wordGroup: furnishing fabric 装饰织物；家具布

sentences.en: To enable rental increases, you have to have luxurious furnishings.
sentences.cn: 为能实现租金增长，你得有豪华的室内陈设。

sentences.en: The decoration and furnishings had to be practical enough for a family home.
sentences.cn: 装修和家具陈设必须对一个家庭住房来说够实用。

sentences.en: For protection against unforeseen emergencies, you insure your house, your furnishings and your car.
sentences.cn: 为防止发生无法预料的紧急情况，人们给房屋、家具和汽车投保。
